# Functional Impairment Checklist (Non‑Validated)

## Work / School

- Attendance and punctuality
- Performance or productivity changes
- Errors, missed deadlines, or conflicts

## Social / Relationships

- Withdrawal or isolation
- Conflict or reduced engagement
- Loss of interest in social activities

## Home / Daily Living

- Household tasks and responsibilities
- Self‑care routines
- Parenting or caregiving challenges

## Summary Prompt

- Identify the most impaired domain and describe examples.
